name: em_showcase
description: An app showcasing common components built by the Evidence management team

scripts.setup:frontend: cd src/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run setup:api && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.test: npm run lint -- $@ && npm run test:unit -- $@ && npm run test:acceptance -- $@
scripts.test:unit: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=. mocha --require ts-node/register 'test/unit/**/*.test.ts' --reporter spec --recursive
scripts.test:coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=. nyc mocha --require ts-node/register 'test/unit/**/*.test.ts' './test/acceptance/**/*.test.ts'
scripts.test:acceptance: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=. mocha --require ts-node/register './test/acceptance/**/*.test.ts' --reporter spec --recursive
scripts.test:smoke: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=. mocha --require ts-node/register './test/functional/**/*.test.ts' --grep @smoke --reporter spec --recursive
scripts.test:functional: cross-env NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=. mocha --require ts-node/register './test/functional/**/*.test.ts' --reporter spec --recursive
